    How Do I Apply for a Visa to Come to the UK?

    If you are planning to travel to the United Kingdom, you need to determine in advance the type of visa you need to apply for, depending on the purpose of your trip and your citizenship status. This guide clearly and simply explains which visas you can apply for as a visitor, student, worker, or family member, the application requirements, and important points to consider...
